careers.title: Surveying Technician
careers.whyThis: Surveying Technician uses the Physical Sciences you’ve already been learning. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Surveying Technician involves.

careers.title: Waste Management Technician
careers.whyThis: Waste Management Technician uses the Chemical Sciences and Physical Sciences you’ve already been learning. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Waste Management Technician involves.
